judgment_criteria.VERIFIED: Claim confirmed by tier 1-2 sources with specific data
judgment_criteria.DOWNGRADED: Partial verification but significance/confidence requires adjustment
judgment_criteria.REMOVED: Unable to verify or contradicted by authoritative sources

detailed_verifications.title: AI Attracts 65% of Startup Capital in 2026

sources_checked.finding: AI startups garnered $222.1 billion (65% of total) in 2025 venture funding
More than half of all VC dollars now flow to AI companies
More than half of all VC dollars (and 36% of deals) now flow to AI companies

cross_verification.notes: The 65% figure is corroborated by Crunchbase tier 2 data. While original source (CEO Today Magazine) was tier 3, the claim is substantively accurate.

final_assessment.action: 활용 가능 - Tier 2 소스에서 교차 검증 완료

detailed_verifications.title: Capital Efficiency Becomes Top VC Priority

sources_checked.source: Harvard Law School Forum on Corporate Governance
sources_checked.finding: Capital efficiency, profitability, and clear unit economics are now top priority for VCs
VCs shifting from hype to pragmatism, emphasizing ROI and efficient operations
Venture capital shifts from hype to value; profitability and operational depth required

cross_verification.notes: Despite originating from tier 4 source (Presta), the capital efficiency trend is extensively corroborated by tier 1-2 sources including Harvard Law, TechCrunch, and Entrepreneur.

final_assessment.action: 활용 권장 - 다수 권위 소스에서 트렌드 확인

detailed_verifications.title: Analogue January: Gen Z Ditches Screens for Tactile Experiences

sources_checked.finding: Confirms 'Analogue January' movement and rise of analog lifestyle in 2026
Gen Z trends point to 'curated calm' and nostalgia in 2026
86% of Gen Z striving to reduce screen time; digital detox trend confirmed

cross_verification.notes: Trend is corroborated by multiple sources but all are tier 3. No tier 1-2 academic or research institution data found. The claim about 'Human-Made' becoming more powerful than 'Organic' lacks quantitative support.

final_assessment.action: 모니터링 대상 - 하향 조정, tier 1-2 연구 데이터 확보 시 재평가
final_assessment.downgrade_reason: Multiple tier 3 sources confirm trend exists but no authoritative research data (Pew, McKinsey, academic) to support significance 3 claim

detailed_verifications.title: Gen Z Seeks Emotional Grounding Amid Ambient Chaos

sources_checked.finding: Gen Z excellent mental health dropped from 37% to 23% over six years
1 in 4 Gen Z report feeling emotionally distressed (25%), nearly double other generations
46% of Gen Zs report feeling stressed or anxious most/all of the time

cross_verification.notes: The underlying mental health crisis data is well-supported by tier 1 sources (McKinsey, UNICEF). However, the specific framing of 'emotional grounding' and 'ambient chaos' from tier 4 Futurist Speakers lacks direct corroboration. The trend direction is accurate but the signal's interpretation is editorial.

final_assessment.action: 활용 가능 - 기저 데이터는 검증됨, 해석적 프레이밍은 주의 필요
final_assessment.downgrade_reason: Mental health crisis data verified by tier 1 sources, but signal's specific framing ('ambient chaos', 'intentional living') is tier 4 editorial interpretation. Recommend citing underlying McKinsey/UNICEF data instead.

detailed_verifications.title: 2026 AI Enforcement Year: Focus on Red Lines

sources_checked.finding: Expert predictions that 2026 will be year of enforcement and red lines
UN General Assembly opened with urgent plea for binding AI safeguards; 200+ figures demand red lines by 2026
AI governance through global red lines discussed; AI Impact Summit in India Feb 2026 as key milestone
200+ experts including Hinton, Bengio demand global AI red lines by 2026

cross_verification.notes: The 'red lines' concept and 2026 enforcement push are well-documented by tier 1-2 sources. However, whether actual enforcement occurs remains speculative. Key upcoming event: AI Impact Summit in India (Feb 2026) will be decisive.

final_assessment.action: 모니터링 권장 - 2026년 2월 AI Impact Summit 결과에 따라 재평가
final_assessment.pending_reason: While the push for AI red lines is well-documented, actual enforcement outcomes are yet to be determined. Key validation point: AI Impact Summit (India, Feb 2026) and subsequent policy actions.
monitoring_triggers: Any actual enforcement actions by governments
